titleStmt.title: An epistle dedicated to an honourable person in the which are discouered a dozen bad spirits, who from the beginning haue much haunted & grieuously tormented the Protestant congregation, so that euery one may perceaue, if he be not tooto [sic] partiall, and ouermuch carryed away with affection, that such an assembly cannot be the true Church of God.
titleStmt.author: Wright, William, 1563-1639.

titleStmt.title: An epistle dedicated to an honourable person in the which are discouered a dozen bad spirits, who from the beginning haue much haunted & grieuously tormented the Protestant congregation, so that euery one may perceaue, if he be not tooto [sic] partiall, and ouermuch carryed away with affection, that such an assembly cannot be the true Church of God.
titleStmt.author: Wright, William, 1563-1639.

notesStmt.note: Place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained, torn, tightly bound, and with print show- through, and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
